mapper.select: select o.id,o.serviceId,o.type,s.name,s.parentC,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,o.userId from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.id = #{orderId} and o.serviceId = s.id
select o.begin_date ,o.end_date , o.payFlag from cs_order o where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = #{serviceId} and payFlag=1 order by end_date desc
select o.begin_date ,o.end_date , o.payFlag from cs_order o where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = #{serviceId} and payFlag=0 order by begin_date desc

select o.begin_date ,o.end_date , o.payFlag, o.serviceId from (select max(begin_date) begin_date from cs_order where isAPI=3 and payFlag=1 group by serviceId ) a, cs_order o where o.userId = #{userId} and a.begin_date=o.begin_date order by begin_date desc

select o.homeIcon,o.id,o.type,o.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,o.package_type,o.num,o.delFlag from (select s.home_icon as homeIcon,o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI, 0 as package_type,0 as num,o.delFlag from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI in(0,2,3) union select s.home_icon as homeIcon,o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,oa.package_type,oa.num,o.delFlag from cs_order o,cs_service_api s,cs_order_api oa where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI = 1 and oa.id = o.id) o where 1=1 and o.delFlag != 1 and o.payFlag = 1 order by o.create_date desc

select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{id} and o.serviceId = s.id and o.status in (1,2) and o.delFlag != 1 and o.payFlag = 1 order by o.create_date desc

select o.homeIcon,o.id,o.type,o.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,o.package_type,o.num,o.price,o.orderListId from (select s.home_icon as homeIcon,o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI, 0 as package_type,0 as num,o.delFlag,o.price,ifnull(o.orderListId,o.id) as orderListId from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI in(0,2,3) union select s.home_icon as homeIcon,o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,oa.package_type,oa.num,o.delFlag,o.price,ifnull(o.orderListId,o.id) as orderListId from cs_order o,cs_service_api s,cs_order_api oa where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI = 1 and oa.id = o.id) o where 1=1
AND o.status in (1,2)
AND o.status in (2,3)
and ( (o.begin_date <= now() and o.status in (0)) or o.status in (3,4,5) or (end_date >= now() and o.isAPI in(1,3) ))
and o.delFlag != 1 and o.payFlag = 1
group by o.orderListId
order by o.create_date desc
limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize}

select o.homeIcon,o.id,o.type,o.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,o.package_type,o.num,o.price,o.orderListId from (select s.home_icon as homeIcon,o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI, 0 as package_type,0 as num,o.delFlag,o.price,ifnull(o.orderListId,o.id) as orderListId from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.orderListId = #{orderListId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI in(0,2,3) union select s.home_icon as homeIcon,o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,oa.package_type,oa.num,o.delFlag,o.price,ifnull(o.orderListId,o.id) as orderListId from cs_order o,cs_service_api s,cs_order_api oa where o.orderListId = #{orderListId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI = 1 and oa.id = o.id) o where 1=1
and o.delFlag != 1 and o.payFlag = 1
and o.status in (2,3)
and ( (o.begin_date <= now() and o.status in (0)) or o.status in (3,4,5) or (end_date >= now() and o.isAPI = 1))
order by o.create_date desc
select a.ip from cs_order_ip a where a.orderId=#{orderId}
select * from cs_order where id=( select orderId from cs_order_ip where id=#{order_ip_Id})
SELECT t.* FROM cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa WHERE t.order_asset_Id = oa.id AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} and t.status = 2
SELECT c.id FROM cs_order c WHERE c.userId=#{userId} AND c.id=#{orderId} AND c.type =#{type}
mapper.delete: delete from cs_order where id = #{orderId} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cs_order c WHERE c.id=#{orderId}
select sum(tasknum) from cs_order where userId = #{userId}
select o.* from cs_task t join cs_order_asset oa on t.order_asset_Id = oa.id join cs_order o on oa.orderId = o.id where t.taskId = #{taskId}

select.if: select * from cs_order o where o.status not in (1,2) and o.delFlag !=1 and o.payFlag = 1 and o.isAPI = 0 and o.create_date >='2016-06-28 00:00:00' order by create_date desc

select * from cs_order o where o.status in (0) and o.delFlag !=1 and o.payFlag = 1 and o.isAPI = 2 and o.serviceId = 6 and DATE_FORMAT(o.begin_date, '%Y-%m-%d') between date_add(CURDATE(),interval -1 day) and CURDATE()
select * from cs_order o where o.status in (0) and o.delFlag !=1 and o.payFlag = 1 and o.isAPI = 1
select * from cs_order o where o.status in (4) and o.delFlag !=1 and o.payFlag = 1 and o.isAPI = 2 and o.serviceId = 6 and o.end_date < now()

select * from cs_order o where o.status in (4) and o.delFlag !=1 and o.payFlag = 1 and o.isAPI = 2 and o.serviceId = 6 and date_add(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d'),interval #{deadline} day) = DATE_FORMAT(o.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d')

mapper.update: update cs_linkman set name=#{name},mobile=#{mobile},email=#{email} where id=(SELECT o.contactId FROM cs_order o WHERE o.id=#{orderId})
update cs_linkman set name=#{name},mobile=#{mobile},email=#{email} where id=(SELECT o.contactId FROM cs_order_api o WHERE o.id=#{orderId})
mapper.delete: delete FROM cs_linkman WHERE id =(SELECT o.contactId FROM cs_order o WHERE o.id=#{orderId} and o.userId = #{userId})
mapper.select: select o.id,o.serviceId,o.type,s.name,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,o.userId from cs_order o,cs_service_api s where o.id = #{orderId} and o.serviceId = s.id
select api.num from cs_order_api api,cs_order order1 where api.id=#{orderId} and order1.payFlag=1 and order1.id=api.id

select t1.type,count(t1.type) as userNums from ( select type,userId from cs_order where delFlag=0 and payFlag=1 and type=1 group by type,userId ) as t1 union select t2.type,count(t2.type) as userNums from ( select type,userId from cs_order where delFlag=0 and payFlag=1 and type=2 group by type,userId having userId not in( select userId from cs_order where delFlag=0 and payFlag=1 and type=1 group by userId ) ) as t2
select t1.type,t2.`name`,count(t1.id) as countNums from cs_order as t1 inner join cs_service as t2 on t1.serviceId=t2.id and t1.delFlag=0 and t1.payFlag=1 group by t1.type,t1.serviceId
